1.description: Read a book set in the past or with a historical figure as a character.

2.description: Read a book with magical creatures, settings, or a non-human protagonist.

3.description: Read a book with a magical system and/or a romantic plot.

4.description: Read a book set in the future or one with a morally gray main character.

5.description: Read a book with a plot twist, deception, or hidden identity.

6.description: Read a classic novel you have not yet read.
